title: Activity Marker
source:
[[div_ class="activity-container"]]
[[span class="large-marker"]]large canon[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[!--
[[module CountPages tags="{$tag}" created_at="last 24 month" wrapper="no"]]
[[div_ class="activity-container [[#ifexpr %%total%% >= 5 | active | na ]] [[#ifexpr %%total%% >= 15 | very-active | ]]"]]
[[span class="act-marker"]]active (%%total%% works)[[/span]]
[[span class="vact-marker"]]very active (%%total%% works)[[/span]]
[[span class="large-marker"]]large canon[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
--]
